Title: Malala Yousafzai arrives Abuja, to accelerate progress for girls’ education
Summary: Malala Fund co-founder, Malala Yousafzai, has arrived in Abuja, Nigeria, for a meeting . Malala will join Malala fund CEO, Lena Alfi, board members, and her father and founder Ziauddin .

Title: Leadway, PFSCU, states, foundations to boost agric resilience against climate shocks
Summary: Leadway Assurance Company Limited has deepened its commitment to Nigeria’s food security by joining forces with the Presidential Food Systems Coordinating Unit (PFSCU), State Governments, and the PULA/Bayer Foundations in a strategic partnership designed to protect smallholder farmers from climate-induced shocks .

Title: 5 fun date ideas beyond the restaurant table
Summary: Great dates are about connection, laughter, and a little romance, not just food . Some of the most memorable moments come from doing something unexpected . If you’re tired of the same restaurant routine, here are five fresh alternatives .

Title: Cross river: Pirates abduct 17 passengers on Oron–Calabar waterway
Summary: 17 passengers travelling by boat from Oron in Akwa Ibom State to Calabar, Cross River State, have been abducted by pirates . Police confirmed the incident on the Oron–Calabar waterway .

Title: Nigeria’s Mahmoud Ben-Tukur re-elected to ICAO Council
Summary: Nigeria has secured re-election into Part II of the Council of the International Civil Aviation Organisation (ICAO) Engr. Mahmoud Ben-Tukur emerged victorious after a vote .

Title: NDLEA intercepts bandits’ drug suppliers, nabs kingpins, destroys 24,000kg skunk
Summary: NDLEA has intercepted major consignments of illicit drugs in Borno, Yobe, Lagos, Edo, and other states . The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) foiled attempts to supply narcotics to terrorists and bandits . The agency also dismantled high-level trafficking networks .

Title: NBA urges security agencies to rescue member abducted while returning from call to bar ceremony
Summary: Udoka, who was recently called to the Bar, was kidnapped while returning from the Call to Bar ceremony in Abuja . NBA urges security agencies to rescue the abducted member .

Title: Trade Facilitation: Nigeria customs rolls out One-Stop cargo clearance hub
Summary: Nigeria Customs Service (NCS) has launched a One-Stop-Shop (OSS) Initiative aimed at cutting cargo clearance time to just 48 hours . Unveiled during a high-level management meeting in Abuja, the platform brings together key Customs Area Controllers and senior officials .

Title: Edo Govt to rebuild APC chieftain’s demolished hotel
Summary: Edo State Government has announced plans to rebuild the demolished hotel belonging to the All Progressives Congress (APC) Youth Leader, Tony Adun . Court of Appeal judgment upheld earlier rulings ordering the restoration of the facility .

Title: Top 10 countries with the largest population of Christians in Africa
Summary: Christianity has deep roots in Africa, dating back to the first century AD . The Ethiopian Orthodox Church is one of the oldest Christian populations in the world .
